question: Posted By Bruce Davis on November 30, 1997 at 18:36:20:Please help!I have had for two years cold, hurting feet and legs;swollen hands at night with no cause being found.  I do not have diabetes but have recently tested for severe hypoglycemia.  Is there any evidence that low blood sugar can cause neuropathy?I am for three months now on a sugarless diet, no caffine, high in carbs, low in protein with 50% help for my symptoms. My internist and neurologist don't really have any more information for me.Where do I turn?Thanks,  Bruce Davis
title: hypoglycemia & Neuropathy
